title: Habibi: A Muslim Love Story Anthology
description: Habibi is a new zine-style anthology featuring prose stories and comics weaving together stories of love told by Muslim women. Each piece is a unique perspective on what love can mean to someone, whether it's romantic, familial, or even love of self.Very rarely are Muslim women part of the narrative on love in any of its forms and now we're speaking for ourselves.
author: Hadeel al-Massari
